sn45.35:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the ascetic life and the fruits of the ascetic life.
sn45.35:1.4: And what is the ascetic life?
sn45.35:1.5: It is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.35:1.6: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.35:1.7: This is called the ascetic life.
sn45.35:1.8: And what are the fruits of the ascetic life?
sn45.35:1.9: The fruits of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, and perfection.
sn45.35:1.10: These are called the fruits of the ascetic life.”
